SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_TIMEZONEENTRY_GETBYNAME
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Retrieve the TimeZoneEntry.ID for the given Name. Used by Address Coordinate TimeZone Global Change (Custom)
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Technical Training
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_TIMEZONEENTRY_GETBYNAME ( @TimeZoneName as varchar(400) ) as DECLARE @RETVAL as uniqueidentifier
begin Select @RETVAL = ID from TIMEZONEENTRY WHERE NAME = @TimeZoneName
SELECT @RETVAL
end
